review: Best and simplest streaming device out there. Love it. It has ALMOST every app I would want to be streamed, there are a couple that need to get on board, hopefully they will before too long. Also, Google gives away tons of promotional credit when you buy one, which more than pays for the cost of the Chromecast!
author: K. Christensen
